attributes.action: Ensure teaching programmes are intorduced to all schools to educate children what are acceptable levels of discipline & care, in order to put a stop to abuse, prevention is better than cure!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would train our children re. what behaviours are acceptable from others, however also providing a level of understanding at an early age as to what is acceptable & what is not.
And ensure that social services are given the power to intervene before abuse takes place & not after.
